paper_abstract: A sieve bootstrap procedure for constructing interpolation intervals for a general class of linear processes is proposed. This sieve bootstrap provides consistent estimators of the conditional distribution of the missing values, given the observed data. A Monte Carlo experiment is used to show the finite sample properties of the sieve bootstrap and finally, the performance of the proposed method is illustrated with a real data example. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A time series bootstrap procedure for interpolation intervals
